short_summary: NGINX software Maintenance and Support for Agriculture Agri-Food Canada
description: Notice of Amendment 1, Question and Answer - Question et rponse (2023-04-14) has been published, Shared Services Canada requires, NGINX software Maintenance and Support for Agriculture Agri-Food Canada, in Ottawa, Ontario as outlined in the attached Request for Quotations, A bid must comply with all requirements of the bid solicitation to be declared responsive, The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract
full_summary:
### [NGINX Software Maintenance and Support for Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada]

#### Summary

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires NGINX software maintenance and support services in Ottawa, Ontario. This request for quotation invites bidders to submit a quotation that meets all the requirements outlined in the request for quotation document.

#### Request Details

* **Procurement Number:** SSC-23-00022505:T
* **Solicitation Number:** BPM018679/22505
* **Date of Publication:** 2023-04-06
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-24T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Date of Amendment:** 2023-04-14

#### Key Requirements

* Bidders must submit a quotation that meets all the requirements of the request for quotation document.
* Pricing must be submitted in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing.
* The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Important Notice

Due to the impacts from the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority’s email. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances, for this procurement.

#### Government of Canada’s Procurement Regulations

* Procurement Category: Service
* Procurement Method: Competitive – Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Ontario (except National Capital Region), National Capital Region

#### Additional Information

* Notice of Amendment 1, including the document “Question and Answer – Question et réponse (2023-04-14)”, has been published.
* Suppliers can access additional information, including the request for quotation document, at the following URLs:
	+ English: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/3D19C2EF-B943-4EDD-9D80-B7FCE74D71BF, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/DE8F7677-10AE-4C2D-B7C0-795BF72F6C67, https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download/98E723C3-7DA0-4590-95E7-EFB5E7FB6
